scripts.start: echo Use \"npm run start-server\" or \"npm run start-server-dev\" instead (see README.md for more info)
scripts.start-server: npm run tests && NODE_ENV=production PORT=8080 naught start --worker-count 8 --ipc-file server/naught.ipc --pid-file server/naught.pid --log server/naught.log --stdout server/stdout.log --stderr server/stderr.log start.js
scripts.start-server-dev: NODE_ENV=development PORT=8081 naught start --worker-count 2 --ipc-file server/dev/naught.ipc --pid-file server/dev/naught.pid --log server/dev/naught.log --stdout server/dev/stdout.log --stderr server/dev/stderr.log start.js
scripts.deploy: npm run tests && NODE_ENV=production PORT=8080 naught deploy server/naught.ipc
scripts.tests: mocha code/tests && nsp check --output checkstyle && retire
